member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Create(System.IO.Stream,Xceed.Document.NET.DocumentTypes)
member.summary: Creates a document using a Stream.
member.param: The Stream to create the document from.
member.returns: Returns a Document object which represents the document.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Create(System.String,Xceed.Document.NET.DocumentTypes)
member.summary: Creates a document using a fully qualified or relative filename.
member.param: The fully qualified or relative filename.
member.returns: Returns a Document object which represents the document.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Load(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads a document into a Document object using a Stream.
member.param: The Stream to load the document from.
member.returns: Returns a Document object which represents the document.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a document into a Document object using a fully qualified or relative filename.
member.param: The fully qualified or relative filename.
member.returns: Returns a DocX object which represents the document.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Save
member.summary: Save this document back to the location it was loaded from.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Copy
member.summary: Copy the Document into a new Document
member.returns: Returns a copy of a the Document
